sentences.en: Always lock your bicycle to something secure.
sentences.cn: 每次都要把自行车锁在牢固的物体上。

sentences.en: At the highest executive levels earnings and performance aren't always correlated.
sentences.cn: 在最高管理层，收入与工作表现并不总是相关的。

sentences.en: Bosses have a way of always finding out about such things.
sentences.cn: 老板总喜欢把这类事情搞清楚。

sentences.en: Do you always have a bet on the Grand National?
sentences.cn: 你总是对全国赛马大会下点注吗？

sentences.en: He hadn’t always been a butler.
He is always eager for new experiences and ever-willing to experiment.
sentences.cn: 他总是渴望拥有新的经历，而且永远愿意尝试。

sentences.en: I always feel at home at Ye Olde Starre Inn.
sentences.cn: 在昨日星辰客栈，我总有种宾至如归的感觉。

sentences.en: I have always had an enquiring mind where food is concerned.
sentences.cn: 我在吃的方面一向很爱探究求索。

sentences.en: I'm always pleased to try out a new variety.
sentences.cn: 我一直乐于尝试新产品。

sentences.en: It is nearly always women who are the primary care givers.
sentences.cn: 从事初级保健护理工作的几乎都是女性。

sentences.en: Jane's always annoying her and she takes it out on me sometimes.
sentences.cn: 简老是惹她生气，她有时就拿我出气。

sentences.en: Jay had always tended to keep his girlfriends at a distance.
sentences.cn: 杰伊一贯和他的女朋友们保持距离。

sentences.en: People always think I'm a fool, and I dare say they're right.
sentences.cn: 人们总认为我是个傻瓜，想必他们是对的。

sentences.en: She’d always assumed that Gabriel was a girl’s name.
sentences.cn: 她一直认为加布里埃尔是个女孩名字。

sentences.en: She's going to be fine. She always was pretty strong.
sentences.cn: 她会好的。她一直都很强壮。

sentences.en: Sontag has always been that rarity, a glamorous intellectual.
sentences.cn: 桑塔格一直是那种兼具美貌与智慧的人中龙凤。

sentences.en: There has always been a difference between community radio and commercial radio.
sentences.cn: 社区广播电台和商业广播电台一直是有区别的。

sentences.en: Why were grown-ups always so stuffy and slow to recognize good ideas?
sentences.cn: 为什么成年人总是那么一本正经，对好点子反应那么迟缓呢？

trans.tran_cn: 总是，一直，永远，老是，总还
trans.tran_en: all the time, at all times, or every time
